thread.title: Victoria loves tequila: David Beckham
thread.title_full: Victoria loves tequila: David Beckham - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Victoria loves tequila: David Beckham
text:
Los Angeles:  Former footballer David Beckham says his wife Victoria has developed a great 'love' for 'tequila'.


David Beckham with wife Victoria 
"She (Victoria) loves it (tequila), which is a very new thing. I think everyone's had their moment on tequila over the years, but when you get older, you appreciate it a bit more," David told Conde Nast Traveller magazine, reports femalefirst.co.uk.
David also says that he is better at packing for trips than his fashion designer wife because he is always organised and well-prepared.
"I'm one of the best packers you will probably ever meet. I'm obsessed with being ready and having everything in place. I'm very well-prepared for any trip that's coming up. I have friends that take the mickey out of me for it, and my wife is a last-minute packer and nowhere near as organised as me," he said.
